# hopper

[![Golang](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Go-00ADD8?logo=go&logoColor=white&style=for-the-badge)](https://golang.google.cn/)
[![Protobuf](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Protobuf-d8d8d8?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoColor=white&style=for-the-badge)](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/)

A gRPC and GraphQL service for collecting and querying IoT device event messages
